TenUI::DisplayObject

TenUI::DisplayObject Class Reference

#include <DisplayObject.h>

Inheritance diagram for TenUI::DisplayObject:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base Abstract class all displayable objects. Contains basic properties all displayable objects will have:
  • Object ID
  • Width, Height
  • X, Y
  • Scale
  • Rotation

Defines virtual methods that subclasses must override

  • init()
  • deinit()
  • update()
  • draw()

Initialization/Deinitialization

Functions that maintain initialization and deinitialization of the DisplayObject.

virtual void deinit ()=0
virtual void init ()=0

Public Member Functions

Update/Drawing
Functions that maintain updating and drawing of the DisplayObject. When TenUI loops through DisplayObjects, these functions are called for each DisplayObject in this order:
  1. update
  2. preDraw
  3. draw
  4. postDraw


virtual void update ()=0
virtual void preDraw ()
virtual void draw ()=0
virtual void postDraw ()

shared_ptr
< DisplayObject > 		getParent ()
void setParent (const shared_ptr< DisplayObject > &p)
Enable/Disable
DisplayObjects upon creation are enabled by default. If a DisplayObject is disabled, then TenUI will not the call the DisplayObject's Update/Drawing functions.

bool getEnabled ()
void setEnabled (bool e)
Dimensions
virtual void setWH (unsigned int nw, unsigned int nh)
virtual unsigned int getW ()
virtual void setW (unsigned int nw)
virtual unsigned int getH ()
virtual void setH (unsigned int nh)
Visibility
double getOpacity ()
void setOpacity (float o)
Positioning
Functions that maintain the DisplayObject's position from different anchor points and global/local perspectives. A DisplayObject's position can be set based the Bottom-Left or Center anchor points. A DisplayObject's position can be set in terms global (or screen) or local coordinates. Local coordinates are relative to the parent.

void setGlobalCenterXY (int cx, int cy)
void setGlobalCenterX (int cx)
void setGlobalCenterY (int cy)

Member Function Documentation

virtual void TenUI::DisplayObject::init (  )  [protected, pure virtual]

Subclasses must override this method to initialize self. This method is called on creation.

Implemented in TenUI::DisplayObjectContainer, and TenUI::UIComponent.

virtual void TenUI::DisplayObject::deinit (  )  [pure virtual]

Subclasses must override this method to deinitialize self. This method is called before removal from TenUI.

Implemented in TenUI::DisplayObjectContainer.

virtual void TenUI::DisplayObject::update (  )  [pure virtual]

Subclasses must override this method to update self. This method is called before drawing occurs.

Implemented in TenUI::DisplayObjectContainer, and TenUI::UIComponent.

void TenUI::DisplayObject::preDraw (  )  [virtual]

Sets up view for drawing. This would include setting the views location, rotation, and scale

virtual void TenUI::DisplayObject::draw (  )  [pure virtual]

Subclasses must override this method to specify how to draw itself

Implemented in TenUI::DisplayObjectContainer.

void TenUI::DisplayObject::postDraw (  )  [virtual]

Resets the view to a state before drawing

Returns:

void TenUI::DisplayObject::calcCenterX (  )  [protected, virtual]

Recalculates the centerx based on x-coordinate and width dimension. Called whenever x-coordinate or width dimension has been modified.

void TenUI::DisplayObject::calcCenterY (  )  [protected, virtual]

Recalculates the centery based on y-coordinate and height dimension. Called whenever x-coordinate or width dimension has been modified.
